segments.text: I look at the woman, her focus so steadfast as she polishes that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be oblivious to the water spilling all over the cabinets?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s maddening to see her so engrossed in a simple chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are risking everything for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy pushes his limits, his excitement palpable as he reaches further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the instability of that stool makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl’s eager eyes, filled with hope for the sweets above.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment feels like it’s teetering on the edge of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel disgusted by their sneakiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocence is beautiful, yet so fraught with danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
